title: Understanding the Scenario
text: The teacher is interested in the average score of the entire class, but she only has data from $$10$$ students. What does this represent?

title: Defining Key Terms
text: A statistic is a numerical value that describes a sample. A parameter describes a population. Which one applies here?

title: Identifying the Correct Term
text: The average score of the $$10$$ students is a measure of the sample, not the entire class. What is this called?
